info.name: YouTube Black 2-Column
info.description:
Warning this needs work and not every page has been re-styled. But if you want a black version of the new YouTube design, with 2 column front display then look no future. Fork this style and modify it to your hearts content.

I will be making updates to the style for all the pages, in the coming weeks as I am using this for my personal use as well.

Enjoy!
info.additionalInfo:
NEWS

11.07.13 - Well looks like Google at it again with more changes without letting us know. The design is totally different now where it breaks my old style. I honestly don't know how long it will take for me to redo most of my work with this new style wide (horrible) design they are going for.

UPDATES

11.07.13 - Added styling to the notifications button, and fixed some misc styles.
11.06.13 - Added fix for new comments, floating issue on subscriptions page (Thx DuskWolf) and fixed side column title.
07.10.13 - Fixed floating width based on the new guide enabled additions.
04.22.13 - Included styles for new carousel channel browser feature added to homepage.
03.21.13 - Medium size video display now appears larger when the window is lower then a height of 1040px. YouTube re-size above this height, for 4:3 monitors.
03.20.13 - Fixed issues with the user avatars.
01.23.13 - Updated background colour to changes made to recently to the site.
12.13.12 - Updated the view all comments page.
12.07.12 - Updated colours on all pages now so all text and elements should be visible. Made subscriptions side panel longer.
